summary: I WAS DRIVING IN THE HIGHWAY AND NOTICE SOMETHING WRONG IN THE VEHICLE AND THEN IN THE FRONT WINDOW A MESSAGE APPEAR SAYING STEERING FAULT SERVICE NOW ALMOST CRASH IN THE SIDE CONCRETE WALL. THEN WHEN I GOT TO THE HOUSE AND I TURN OFF THE CAR, AND TURN IT BACK ON AGAIN THE STEERING WAS HARD AND I COULDN'T MOVE THE CAR NO MORE AND THEN THREE MESSAGES APPEAR TALKING ABOUT THE ELECTRONIC STEERING FAILURE
